document: The French Chanson in the Fourteenth Century By Margaret Paine Hasselman A.B. (Smith College) 1962 M.A. (University of California) 1964 DISSERTATION Submitted in partial satisfaction of the requirements for the degree of DOCTOR OF PHILOSOPHY in Music in the GRADUATE DIVISION of the UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA, BERKELEY Approved: Committee in Charge DEGREE CONFERRED JUNE 16, 1970
